resources.name: 201 - Create Contact
resources.description:
### Criando um contato para um cliente

Body:

```json
{
	"email": "will@mail.com",
	"name": "Will Smith",
	"telephone": "99 999999999"
}
```

Response:

```json
{
	"id": "0ad612ff-c9af-43b5-adce-7154aec2c770",
	"name": "John Doe",
	"email": "johndoe@mail.com",
	"telephone": "99 999999999",
	"createdAt": "2023-03-27T02:48:21.231Z",
	"contacts": [
		{
			"id": "803ff900-28e1-4550-b134-554ef18fea5b",
			"name": "Will Smith",
			"email": "will@mail.com",
			"telephone": "99 999999999",
			"createdAt": "2023-03-27T03:29:35.473Z",
			"clientId": "0ad612ff-c9af-43b5-adce-7154aec2c770"
		}
	]
}
```

resources.name: 200 - Update Contact
resources.description:
### Atualizando um contato

Assim como a atualização do cliente, não é necessário passar todas as chaves para atualiá-las no banco de dados

Body:

```json
{
	"email": "smith@mail.com"
}
```

Response:

```json
{
	"id": "803ff900-28e1-4550-b134-554ef18fea5b",
	"name": "Will Smith",
	"email": "smith@mail.com",
	"telephone": "99 999999999",
	"createdAt": "2023-03-27T03:29:35.473Z",
	"clientId": "0ad612ff-c9af-43b5-adce-7154aec2c770"
}
```

resources.name: 204 - Delete Contact
resources.description:
### Deletando um contato

Response:

```
No body returned in response
```

resources.name: 201 - Create Client
resources.description:
### Criando um usuário

Body:
```json
{
	"name": "John Doe",
	"email": "johndoe@mail.com",
	"password": "123456",
	"telephone": "99 999999999"
}
```

Response:
```json
{
	"id": "4e3c1004-a93d-475b-9956-a7717d044da4",
	"name": "John Doe",
	"email": "johndoe@mail.com",
	"password": "$2a$10$0ArOXfchNw6XHgYR.OXpi.H2R5TqkTNNwDzYnnQts8ag.AqkwCVxG",
	"telephone": "99 999999999",
	"createdAt": "2023-03-27T02:48:21.231Z"
}
```

### Possíveis erros

409 - Email duplicado:

```json
{
	"message": "User already exists"
}
```

resources.name: 200 - Retrieve Client (Autenticada)
resources.description:
### Coletando dados de um usuário

É necessário passar o id do usuário desejado no final da url

Response:

```json
{
	"id": "0ad612ff-c9af-43b5-adce-7154aec2c770",
	"name": "John Doe",
	"email": "johndoe@mail.com",
	"telephone": "99 999999999",
	"contacts": [],
	"createdAt": "2023-03-27T02:48:21.231Z"
}
```

### Possíveis erros

401 - Id de usuário inválido

```json
{
	"message": "User was not found"
}
```

resources.name: 200 - List Clients (Autenticada)
resources.description:
### Listando todos os clientes

Response:

```json
[
	{
		"id": "0ad612ff-c9af-43b5-adce-7154aec2c770",
		"name": "John Doe",
		"email": "johndoe@mail.com",
		"telephone": "99 999999999",
		"contacts": [],
		"createdAt": "2023-03-27T02:48:21.231Z"
	}
]
```

resources.name: 200 - Update Client (Autenticada)
resources.description:
### Atualziando os dados de um usuário

A rota pega o usuário para atualizar com base no token, além de que não é necessário passar todos os campos para atualizar no banco de dados

Body:

```json
{
	"password": "Aa123456!"
}
```

Response:

```json
{
	"name": "John Doe",
	"email": "johndoe@mail.com",
	"telephone": "99 999999999",
	"contacts": [],
	"createdAt": "2023-03-27T02:48:21.231Z"
}
```

resources.name: 204 - Delete Client (Autenticada)
resources.description:
### Deletando um cliente

A rota deleta o cliente com base no token, portanto não é necessário passar o Id do usuário

Response:

```
No body returned for response
```

resources.name: 200 - Create Session
resources.description:
### Login

Body:

```json
{
	"email": "johndoe@mail.com",
	"password": "123456"
}
```

Response:

```json
{
	"token": "eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJlbWFpbCI6ImpvaG5kb2VAbWFpbC5jb20iLCJpYXQiOjE2Nzk4ODUzNTUsImV4cCI6MTY3OTg4ODk1NX0.5u7r15WURH7shv4RRE--HEpP_ytgKQyQpdOPoL_U1kY",
	"client": {
		"id": "0ad612ff-c9af-43b5-adce-7154aec2c770",
		"name": "John Doe",
		"email": "johndoe@mail.com",
		"telephone": "99 999999999",
		"contacts": [],
		"createdAt": "2023-03-27T02:48:21.231Z"
	}
}
```

### Possíveis erros

401 - Dados inválidos (email ou senha):

```json
{
	"message": "Invalid credentials"
}
```
